articles.description: Indian shooter Rudrankksh Patil, on Friday, entered an elite club as he became the first Indian to be crowned the World Champion in men's 10m air rifle since Abhinav Bindra in 2006. The youngster also helped India win a quota for the 2024 Paris Olympics throu…
articles.content: Fresh from gold at the recently concluded National Games, Rudrankksh Patil bagged the top prize at the ISSF Shooting World Championships in Cairo, Egypt. He shot an impressive 633.9 in the qualificat… [+170 chars]
